data.message: I need help someone out there I need to change my password as fast as possible

replies.message: Hi Brenda. You can reset your password by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2v5zKZ2. -Ashley

I believe I have been hacked and I would like to know how to change my password I do not know where the settings are to do this could you please tell me how to do it and where the settings are my name is Nancy Smith I got a call saying that they believed I've been hacked that they had contacted her and said that I had come into a big win and had I gotten had she gotten her money yet because her name was on the list she did not answer thank God so I'd appreciate your help thank you
